meanings.definition: Agreement among all members of a group
meanings.sent1: The team reached unanimity on the decision to have a pizza party.
meanings.sent2: The board members showed unanimity in their vote for the new project proposal.
meanings.sent3: The unicorns achieved unanimity on the best flavor of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with the colorful flowers in perfect unanimity.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was filled with unanimity as everyone raised their hands to volunteer.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unanimous
meanings.sent1: The unanimity of the jury's decision brought closure to the case.
meanings.sent2: The unanimity of the crowd's cheers echoed through the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The family's unanimity on movie night led to a hilarious comedy marathon.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the beauty of nature with the unanimity of colors in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The city celebrated with unanimity as the local team won the championship.
